00032 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_MDS
00033 
00034 #include "mdt_internal.h"
00035 
00036 /* Called with res->lr_lvb_sem held */
00037 static int mdt_lvbo_init(struct ldlm_resource *res)
00038 {
00039         if (IS_LQUOTA_RES(res)) {
00040                 struct mdt_device       *mdt;
00041 
00042                 mdt = ldlm_res_to_ns(res)->ns_lvbp;
00043                 if (mdt->mdt_qmt_dev == NULL)
00044                         return 0;
00045 
00046                 /* call lvbo init function of quota master */
00047                 return qmt_hdls.qmth_lvbo_init(mdt->mdt_qmt_dev, res);
00048         }
00049 
00050         return 0;
00051 }
00052 
00053 static int mdt_lvbo_update(struct ldlm_resource *res,
00054                            struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00055                            int increase_only)
00056 {
00057         if (IS_LQUOTA_RES(res)) {
00058                 struct mdt_device       *mdt;
00059 
00060                 mdt = ldlm_res_to_ns(res)->ns_lvbp;
00061                 if (mdt->mdt_qmt_dev == NULL)
00062                         return 0;
00063 
00064                 /* call lvbo update function of quota master */
00065                 return qmt_hdls.qmth_lvbo_update(mdt->mdt_qmt_dev, res, req,
00066                                                  increase_only);
00067         }
00068 
00069         return 0;
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 static int mdt_lvbo_size(struct ldlm_lock *lock)
00074 {
00075         struct mdt_device *mdt;
00076 
00077         /* resource on server side never changes. */
00078         mdt = ldlm_res_to_ns(lock->l_resource)->ns_lvbp;
00079         LASSERT(mdt != NULL);
00080 
00081         if (IS_LQUOTA_RES(lock->l_resource)) {
00082                 if (mdt->mdt_qmt_dev == NULL)
00083                         return 0;
00084 
00085                 /* call lvbo size function of quota master */
00086                 return qmt_hdls.qmth_lvbo_size(mdt->mdt_qmt_dev, lock);
00087         }
00088 
00089         if (ldlm_has_layout(lock))
00090                 return mdt->mdt_max_mdsize;
00091 
00092         return 0;
00093 }
00094 
00095 static int mdt_lvbo_fill(struct ldlm_lock *lock, void *lvb, int lvblen)
00096 {
00097         struct lu_env env;
00098         struct mdt_thread_info *info;
00099         struct mdt_device *mdt;
00100         struct lu_fid *fid;
00101         struct mdt_object *obj = NULL;
00102         struct md_object *child = NULL;
00103         int rc;
00104         ENTRY;
00105 
00106         mdt = ldlm_lock_to_ns(lock)->ns_lvbp;
00107         if (IS_LQUOTA_RES(lock->l_resource)) {
00108                 if (mdt->mdt_qmt_dev == NULL)
00109                         RETURN(0);
00110 
00111                 /* call lvbo fill function of quota master */
00112                 rc = qmt_hdls.qmth_lvbo_fill(mdt->mdt_qmt_dev, lock, lvb,
00113                                              lvblen);
00114                 RETURN(rc);
00115         }
00116 
00117         /* Only fill layout if layout lock is granted */
00118         if (!ldlm_has_layout(lock) || lock->l_granted_mode != lock->l_req_mode)
00119                 RETURN(0);
00120 
00121         /* layout lock will be granted to client, fill in lvb with layout */
00122 
00123         /* XXX create an env to talk to mdt stack. We should get this env from
00124          * ptlrpc_thread->t_env. */
00125         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_MD_THREAD);
00126         /* Likely ENOMEM */
00127         if (rc)
00128                 RETURN(rc);
00129 
00130         info = lu_context_key_get(&env.le_ctx, &mdt_thread_key);
00131         /* Likely ENOMEM */
00132         if (info == NULL)
00133                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00134 
00135         memset(info, 0, sizeof *info);
00136         info->mti_env = &env;
00137         info->mti_exp = lock->l_export;
00138         info->mti_mdt = mdt;
00139 
00140         /* XXX get fid by resource id. why don't include fid in ldlm_resource */
00141         fid = &info->mti_tmp_fid2;
00142         fid_extract_from_res_name(fid, &lock->l_resource->lr_name);
00143 
00144         obj = mdt_object_find(&env, info->mti_mdt, fid);
00145         if (IS_ERR(obj))
00146                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(obj));
00147 
00148         if (!mdt_object_exists(obj) || mdt_object_remote(obj))
00149                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOENT);
00150 
00151         child = mdt_object_child(obj);
00152 
00153         /* get the length of lsm */
00154         rc = mo_xattr_get(&env, child, &LU_BUF_NULL, XATTR_NAME_LOV);
00155         if (rc < 0)
00156                 GOTO(out, rc);
00157 
00158         if (rc > 0) {
00159                 struct lu_buf *lmm = NULL;
00160 
00161                 if (lvblen < rc) {
00162                         CERROR("%s: expected %d actual %d.\n",
00163                                 mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc, lvblen);
00164                         GOTO(out, rc = -ERANGE);
00165                 }
00166 
00167                 lmm = &info->mti_buf;
00168                 lmm->lb_buf = lvb;
00169                 lmm->lb_len = rc;
00170 
00171                 rc = mo_xattr_get(&env, child, lmm, XATTR_NAME_LOV);
00172                 if (rc < 0)
00173                         GOTO(out, rc);
00174         }
00175 
00176 out:
00177         if (obj != NULL && !IS_ERR(obj))
00178                 mdt_object_put(&env, obj);
00179         lu_env_fini(&env);
00180         RETURN(rc < 0 ? 0 : rc);
00181 }
00182 
00183 static int mdt_lvbo_free(struct ldlm_resource *res)
00184 {
00185         if (IS_LQUOTA_RES(res)) {
00186                 struct mdt_device       *mdt;
00187 
00188                 mdt = ldlm_res_to_ns(res)->ns_lvbp;
00189                 if (mdt->mdt_qmt_dev == NULL)
00190                         return 0;
00191 
00192                 /* call lvbo free function of quota master */
00193                 return qmt_hdls.qmth_lvbo_free(mdt->mdt_qmt_dev, res);
00194         }
00195 
00196         return 0;
00197 }
00198 
00199 struct ldlm_valblock_ops mdt_lvbo = {
00200         lvbo_init:      mdt_lvbo_init,
00201         lvbo_update:    mdt_lvbo_update,
00202         lvbo_size:      mdt_lvbo_size,
00203         lvbo_fill:      mdt_lvbo_fill,
00204         lvbo_free:      mdt_lvbo_free
00205 };
